rules_text:
Emerge {3}{B}{WU}
You may sacrifice any type of permanent to pay for this creature’s emerge cost.
If an effect, ability, or cost you pay would require you to sacrifice a creature, you may sacrifice any permanent instead.
Sacrifice a permanent: Scry 1
